Statement: If you are reading this message
If you are reading this message, then the worst happen.  Global warming passed the tipping point.
There is a secret island where a series of laboratories reside.  The boat can take you there, but I give you this warning.
After the tipping point, atmospheric oxygen will be limited, and,
Anticipating that eventuality, I hid oxygen cannisters here on the beach out of view and...
my advice, get your oxygen supplies maximized before you head out to the lab lands.
But be aware, they may already be depleted.  If need be, there are full canisters...
